plugins.name: ultrawork
plugins.description: Strict verification-first development mode with session isolation, mandatory planning, success criteria, evidence collection, and TDD support

plugins.name: ultrawork-js
plugins.description: Node.js cross-platform version of ultrawork - strict verification-first development with TDD support

plugins.name: teamwork
plugins.description: Multi-session collaboration plugin with role-based workers, file-per-task storage, and dashboard status

plugins.name: knowledge-extraction
plugins.description: Collect insights from Claude sessions and extract them into reusable components (Skills, Commands, Agents, CLAUDE.md)
